TopicTitle: Need help for updated mods and where to get them.

Articles.Content:
Last time I played was using the old versions, probably even the beta ones, but now I have managed to get the old setup back on 1.8.1 (almost but not all mods) on a new computer.
I used to play with Mods like AirplanePlus, Tweakscale, Vesselmover, and BDArmory. That were the most basic ones I managed to get running on 1.8.1. Now I wanna move up to at least the latest version where BDarmory works and many more of its addons too like the nuclear thingies, along with the said previous mods and NEAR, but I cannot find them/some I managed to find were scattered on different websites.  Is there any place I can get the latest version of them, without doing the manual moving of files (I have heard of CKAN, but I havent ever used it) and some advices too since its been a long time since I last played.
